TopicTitle: If you were the first person on mars, what would you say?

Articles.Content:
"On this sol begins the era of life on Mars. Simpler life forms may have tried before us, with less determination and adaptability, but this time, let us hope that we sow the seeds of a flourishing world of wonders such as our first home, Earth. This moment marks a pivotal event in Life's colonization of the Solar System, by way of Humanity, it's sapient guardian. We wish only to grow"

Beautiful

"On this sol begins the era of life on Mars. Simpler life forms may have tried before us, with less determination and adaptability, but this time, let us hope that we sow the seeds of a flourishing world of wonders such as our first home, Earth. This moment marks a pivotal event in Life's colonization of the Solar System, by way of Humanity, it's sapient guardian. We wish only to grow"

That is the most remarkable comment i've read so far. Only .... i wouldn't call earth a flourishing world of wonders.

Okay...

"Look at where I am, then look at you are. Sadly, you are not where I'm at. But if you really want to come, you can come here at where I'm at "

Totally stole that from a commercial

Alright everyone. So I've decided to make this little dramatization if I was first on Mars.

Warning -- slightly, slightly strong language... You've been warned. K

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SMnQf3v-L5w
"I hereby rename this planet 'Tosev 4'."

ILL SAY: thats one step for NASA one epic turn for the epic humans *writes wolfe was here and calls houston that we got life* then I scream in the mic and run back to the space ship.

(though this has what i say and do )

"That's two mighty steps. Just another existence worth of steps to go. Let's sprint it."

Edited October 14, 2012 by Panichio

To every thing there is a season, and a time for every purpose under heaven.

or maybe:

Out ride the sons of Terra,

Far drives the thundering jet,

Up leaps a race of Earthmen,

Out, far, and onward yet.

Or if I wasn't being serious probably one of the following:

"Set up the Tripod!"

<Look up at the sky> That's no moon, that's....**fzzt**

We are all heroes: You and Boo and I. Hamsters and rangers everywhere! Rejoice

Take a look at the Lawman

Beating up the wrong guy

Oh man! Wonder if he'll ever know

He's in the best selling show

Is there life on Mars?

And I'd be awfully tempted to have Don't Stop Me Know playing on the descent. o/ Like a rocketship on my way to mars o/
"feels so good to stretch my legs!"
"Yay, I don't have to live on that planet anymore!"
I would pass out because of all the excitement.
"It's beautiful"
"Oops. I left the stove on at home."

I claim this planet under the name raxacoricofallapatorius for raxacoricofallapatorians everywhere!!! (and im such a doctor who nut i didnt even need google to spell it....im so pathetic)

but id ride around mars on the rovers for the lols....
"My God. It's full of Mars!"
That sure was the smelliest 6 months I've ever experienced.
OH GOD! THEY'RE COMING RIGHT AT ME!! AAAAAAARGH-*fake static noises*

"Could a stage hand clean my visor? It's awfully hot under these darn lights"

"While you're at it, I could use an organic soy latte".

"I'll be in my trailer"
"this...is..sparta!!"

One step closer to being better than the dinosaurs.

"

"- StreetLampPro
"Cool were on Mars, how do we get back..."
Like John Bone, first man on mars said: "Well, here we are." .

One step closer to being better than the dinosaurs.

"

"- StreetLampPro

That's some of the best video editing I've ever seen on Youtube
It's one small step for a human, one giant leap for the mankind.
